00015   void Ahc2Mapper::fillModuleConnection(const lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00016     if (col->getParameters().getStringVal("TypeName") != "ModuleConnection") throw WrongDataFormatException("Ahc2Mapper::fillModuleConnection: expects collection of ModuleConnection objects");
00017 
00018     mappingModified();
00019 
00020     std::vector<CALICE::ModuleConnection*> moduleConnections;
00021 
00022     int maxModules = 0;
00023     int maxFe      = 0;
00024     int maxK       = 0;
00025 
00026     clearCrate();
00027     clearSlot();
00028 
00029     for (int i =0; i < col->getNumberOfElements();++i) {
00030       LCGenericObject* obj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(col->getElementAt(i));
00031 
00032       if (obj) {
00033         moduleConnections.push_back(new CALICE::ModuleConnection(obj));
00034         if (moduleConnections.back()->getModuleID() > maxModules) maxModules = moduleConnections.back()->getModuleID();
00035         if (moduleConnections.back()->getFrontEnd() > maxFe) maxFe = moduleConnections.back()->getFrontEnd();
00036         if ((int)CALICE::CellIndex(moduleConnections.back()->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell()).getLayerIndex() > maxK ) maxK = CALICE::CellIndex(moduleConnections.back()->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell()).getLayerIndex();
00037         registerCrate(moduleConnections.back()->getCrate());
00038         registerSlot(moduleConnections.back()->getSlot());
00039         //      registerModuleType(moduleConnections.back()->getModuleType());
00040       }
00041       else throw WrongDataFormatException("Ahc2Mapper::fillModuleConnection: expects collection of LCGenericObject resp. ModuleConnection");
00042     }
00043 
00044     initFe(maxFe);
00045     initModule(maxModules);
00046     initK(maxK);
00047 
00048     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < moduleConnections.size(); ++j) {
00049       int module        = moduleConnections[j]->getModuleID();
00050 
00051       int crate         = moduleConnections[j]->getCrate();
00052       int slot          = moduleConnections[j]->getSlot();
00053       int fe            = moduleConnections[j]->getFrontEnd();
00054 
00055       //      int connectorType = moduleConnections[j]->getConnectorType();
00056       int indexLowLeft  = moduleConnections[j]->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell();
00057       int moduleType    = moduleConnections[j]->getModuleType();
00058       //      std::string connectorTypeName(moduleConnections[j]->getConnectorTypeName());
00059 
00060       /* There is the feature that the type index stored in ModuleConnection is not
00061       * equal to the type stored in the module description. Therefore, a hardcode +4
00062       * is needed.
00063       */
00064       setModuleType(module, getCombinedModuleType(moduleType + 4));
00065 
00066       setModuleCrateSlotFe(module,crate,slot,fe);
00067       setModuleK(module,CALICE::CellIndex(indexLowLeft).getLayerIndex());
00068 
00069       /*
00070       std::cout << "Module " << module << std::endl;
00071       std::cout << " type: " << moduleType << std::endl;
00072       std::cout << " DAQ connection (crate/slot/fe): " << crate <<"/" << slot << "/" << fe << std::endl;
00073       std::cout << " connector type: " << connectorType << " (" << connectorTypeName << ")" << std::endl;
00074       std::cout << " index lower left cell: " << indexLowLeft << " " << CALICE::HcalCellIndex(indexLowLeft) << std::endl;
00075       std::cout << std::endl;
00076       */
00077     }
00078 
00079   }
00080

00082   /* There is design flaw in CALICE::ModuleDescription:
00083   * The translation between the internal cell index and electronic channel
00084   * is not contained in the class and has to be hardcoded.
00085   */
00086   void Ahc2Mapper::getChipChannelForModuleDescriptionID(const unsigned int id, const unsigned int moduleType, int &chip, int &channel) const {
00087     chip    = id / 36; //chip
00088     channel = id % 36; //channel
00089 
00090   }
00091 
00092   /* To get unique module offset identifier for the half-modules
00093   * some clever guy had to shift the cell index. Now, this gives
00094   * the problem, that the geometrical cellID in ModuleDescription
00095   * alone is wrong and needs an offset that is saved in ModuleLocation
00096   * or ModuleConnection.
00097   *
00098   * Unfortunately this cannot be transparently mapped to the data
00099   * structure in this class. This class assumes module types that
00100   * relate i,j to chip,chan. But the above mechanism allows to shift
00101   * i,j for each module indiviually.
00102   *
00103   * Nevertheless, up to now only module-type- and not module-dependant
00104   * shifts are used. Therefore, this gets corrected here.
00105   */
00106   int Ahc2Mapper::correctCellIndex(const unsigned int moduleType, const int cellIndex) const {
00107     return cellIndex;
00108   }
00109 
00110   /* This Mapper expects one module to have only one type, therefore the
00111   * splitting into half-modules has to be reversed.
00112   */
00113   unsigned int Ahc2Mapper::getCombinedModuleType(const unsigned int moduleType) const {
00114     return moduleType/2;
00115   }
00116 
00117   void Ahc2Mapper::fillModuleDescription(const lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00118 
00119     if (col->getParameters().getStringVal("TypeName") != "ModuleDescription") throw WrongDataFormatException("Ahc2Mapper::fillModuleDescription: expects collection of ModuleDescription objects");
00120 
00121     mappingModified();
00122 
00123     std::vector<CALICE::ModuleDescription*> moduleDescriptions;
00124 
00125     int maxChip             = 0;
00126     int maxChannel          = 0;
00127     unsigned int maxI       = 0;
00128     unsigned int maxJ       = 0;
00129 
00130     clearModuleType();
00131 
00132     for (int i =0; i < col->getNumberOfElements();++i) {
00133       LCGenericObject* obj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(col->getElementAt(i));
00134 
00135       if (obj) {
00136         moduleDescriptions.push_back(new CALICE::ModuleDescription(obj));
00137 
00138         unsigned int moduleType = moduleDescriptions.back()->getModuleType();
00139 
00140         //bool individualSize = moduleDescriptions.back()->hasCellDimensionsPerCell();
00141 
00142         //      std::cout << "moduleType: " << moduleType << " has " << moduleDescriptions.back()->getNCells() << " cells " << std::endl;
00143 
00144         unsigned int combinedModuleType = getCombinedModuleType(moduleType);
00145 
00146         registerModuleType(combinedModuleType);
00147 
00148         /* Run over all cells of module types. One design flaw in CALICE::ModuleDescriptions
00149         * is that the classes do not know if cells are valid or not and the
00150         * electronic channel id defines the index of the indivual cells.
00151         * Obviously, a geometrical cell index of 0 seems not reasonable. Therefore,
00152         * we work around by ignoring cells with this index.
00153         */
00154         for ( unsigned int iCell=0; iCell < moduleDescriptions.back()->getNCells(); ++iCell )
00155         if (moduleDescriptions.back()->getGeometricalCellIndex(iCell)) {
00156 
00157 
00158           int chip;
00159           int channel;
00160 
00161           getChipChannelForModuleDescriptionID(iCell, moduleType, chip, channel);
00162 
00163           if (chip    > maxChip)    maxChip    = chip;
00164           if (channel > maxChannel) maxChannel = channel;
00165 
00166 
00167           //maxChip = 15; //[0,15]
00168           //maxChannel = 35; //[0,35]
00169 
00170           CALICE::HcalCellIndex geoID( moduleDescriptions.back()->getGeometricalCellIndex(iCell) );
00171 
00172           unsigned int I = geoID.getPadColumn();
00173           unsigned int J = geoID.getPadRow();
00174 
00175           // unsigned int sizeI;
00176           // unsigned int sizeJ;
00177 
00178           // if (individualSize) {
00179           //   sizeI = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions.back()->getIndividualCellWidth(iCell)/10;
00180           //   sizeJ = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions.back()->getIndividualCellHeight(iCell)/10;
00181           // }
00182           // else {
00183           //   sizeI = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions.back()->getCellWidth()/10;
00184           //   sizeJ = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions.back()->getCellHeight()/10;
00185           // }
00186 
00187           if (I > maxI) maxI = I;//[0,23]
00188           if (J > maxJ) maxJ = J;//[0,23]
00189 
00190           //    std::cout << "cell " << std::setw(3) << iCell << " is [chip/channel||I/J] " << std::setw(2) << chip << "/" << std::setw(2) << channel << "||" << std::setw(2) << I << "/" << std::setw(2) << J  << " geoIndex:" << moduleDescriptions.back()->getGeometricalCellIndex(iCell)  << std::endl;
00191 
00192         }
00193 
00194       }
00195       else throw WrongDataFormatException("Ahc2Mapper::fillModuleDescription: expects collection of LCGenericObject resp. ModuleDescription");
00196 
00197     }
00198 
00199     // std::cout << "maxChip " << maxChip << " maxChn " << maxChannel << std::endl;
00200     // std::cout << "maxI " << maxI << " maxJ " << maxJ << std::endl;
00201 
00202     initIJChipChannel(maxI,maxJ,maxChip,maxChannel);
00203 
00204     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < moduleDescriptions.size(); ++j) {
00205 
00206       unsigned int moduleType = moduleDescriptions[j]->getModuleType();
00207 
00208       bool individualSize = moduleDescriptions[j]->hasCellDimensionsPerCell();
00209 
00210       //std::cout << "individualSize " << individualSize << std::endl;
00211 
00212       /* Run over all cells of module types. One design flaw in CALICE::ModuleDescriptions
00213       * is that the classes do not know if cells are valid or not and the
00214       * electronic channel id defines the index of the indivual cells.
00215       * Obviously, a geometrical cell index of 0 seems not reasonable. Therefore,
00216       * we work around by ignoring cells with this index.
00217       */
00218       for ( unsigned int iCell=0; iCell < moduleDescriptions[j]->getNCells(); ++iCell )
00219       if (moduleDescriptions[j]->getGeometricalCellIndex(iCell)) {
00220 
00221         int chip;
00222         int channel;
00223         getChipChannelForModuleDescriptionID(iCell, moduleType, chip, channel);
00224 
00225         CALICE::HcalCellIndex geoID( moduleDescriptions[j]->getGeometricalCellIndex(iCell) );
00226         unsigned int I = geoID.getPadColumn();
00227         unsigned int J = geoID.getPadRow();
00228 
00229         unsigned int sizeI;
00230         unsigned int sizeJ;
00231 
00232         // if (individualSize) {
00233         //
00234         //   std::cout << "getIndividualCellWidth " << moduleDescriptions[j]->getIndividualCellWidth(iCell) << std::endl;
00235         //   std::cout << "getIndividualCellHeight " << moduleDescriptions[j]->getIndividualCellHeight(iCell) << std::endl;
00236         //
00237         //   sizeI = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions[j]->getIndividualCellWidth(iCell)/10;
00238         //   sizeJ = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions[j]->getIndividualCellHeight(iCell)/10;
00239         // }
00240         // else {
00241         //   sizeI = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions[j]->getCellWidth()/10;
00242         //   sizeJ = (unsigned int) moduleDescriptions[j]->getCellHeight()/10;
00243         // }
00244 
00245         sizeI = 1;
00246         sizeJ = 1;
00247 
00248         setModuleTypeIJChipChannel(getCombinedModuleType(moduleType), I, J, sizeI, sizeJ, chip, channel);
00249 
00250       }
00251     }
00252 
00253 
00254   }

00257   unsigned int Ahc2Mapper::countAvailable(const std::vector<bool> &vec) const {
00258     unsigned int counter = 0;
00259     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i)
00260     if (vec[i]) counter++;
00261     return counter;
00262 
00263   }

00265   void Ahc2Mapper::printStats(std::ostream &ostream) const {
00266     ostream << "max/used modules       = " << std::setw(5) << _nMod     -1  << " / " << std::setw(5) << countAvailable(_moduleAvailable)      << std::endl
00267     << "max/used module Types  = " << std::setw(5) << _nModType -1  << " / " << std::setw(5) << countAvailable(_moduleTypeAvailable)  << std::endl
00268     << "    used crates        = " << std::setw(5) << ""            << " / " << std::setw(5) << _nCrate                               << std::endl
00269     << "max/used slots         = " << std::setw(5) << _maxSlot      << " / " << std::setw(5) << _nSlot                                << std::endl
00270     << "max      FE            = " << std::setw(5) << _nFe        -1  << std::endl
00271     << "    used crate/slot/FE = " << std::setw(5) << ""            << " / " << std::setw(5) << countAvailable(_connectionAvailable) << std::endl
00272     << "max      chip          = " << std::setw(5) << _nChip    -1  << std::endl
00273     << "max      chan          = " << std::setw(5) << _nChan    -1  << std::endl
00274     << "max      I             = " << std::setw(5) << _nI         -1  << std::endl
00275     << "max      J             = " << std::setw(5) << _nJ         -1  << std::endl
00276     << "max/used K             = " << std::setw(5) << _nK       -1  << " / " << std::setw(5) << countAvailable(_kAvailable)           << std::endl
00277     << "******* values per module type ****" << std::endl;
00278     for (unsigned int moduleType=0; moduleType < _nModType;++moduleType)
00279     if (_moduleTypeAvailable[_moduleTypeName[moduleType]]) {
00280       ostream << "module type "  << _moduleTypeName[moduleType]                            << std::endl
00281       << "  used I/J         = " << countAvailable(_ijAvailable[moduleType])       << std::endl
00282       << "  used chip/chan   = " << countAvailable(_chipChanAvailable[moduleType]) << std::endl;
00283     }
00284     ostream << std::endl;
00285 
00286   }
00287 
00288   const std::string Ahc2Mapper::printIfAvailable(bool available, unsigned int value) const {
00289     std::ostringstream stream;
00290     if (available) {
00291       stream << value;
00292       return stream.str();
00293     }
00294     else return std::string("not available");
00295   }
00296 
00297   void Ahc2Mapper::print(std::ostream &ostream) const {
00298 
00299     for (unsigned int moduleType=0; moduleType < _nModType;++moduleType)
00300     if (_moduleTypeAvailable[_moduleTypeName[moduleType]]) {
00301       ostream << "module type "  << _moduleTypeName[moduleType] << std::endl
00302       << "   chip channel    I    J  sizeI sizeJ" << std::endl;
00303       for (unsigned int chip=0; chip < _nChip; ++chip)
00304       for (unsigned int channel=0; channel < _nChan; ++channel)
00305       if (_chipChanAvailable[moduleType].at(getIndexChan(chip,channel))) {
00306         ostream << std::setw(7) << chip << " " << std::setw(7) << channel
00307         << " " << std::setw(4) << getIFromIJIndex(_ijVchan.at(moduleType).at(getIndexChan(chip,channel)))
00308         << " " << std::setw(4) << getJFromIJIndex(_ijVchan.at(moduleType).at(getIndexChan(chip,channel)))
00309         << " " << std::setw(4) << _sizeIVchan.at(moduleType).at(getIndexChan(chip,channel))
00310         << " " << std::setw(4) << _sizeJVchan.at(moduleType).at(getIndexChan(chip,channel))
00311         << std::endl;
00312       }
00313     }
00314 
00315     for ( unsigned int module = 0; module < _nMod; module++ )
00316     if (_moduleAvailable.at(module)){
00317       ostream << "Module  " << module << std::endl
00318       << "   type " << printIfAvailable(_moduleAvailable.at(module),_moduleTypeName[_typeVmodule.at(module)]) << std::endl
00319       << "  crate " << getCrate(module) << std::endl
00320       << "   slot " << getSlot(module) << std::endl
00321       << "     fe " << getFe(module) << std::endl
00322       << "      K " << getK(module) << std::endl
00323       << std::endl;
00324     }
00325   }
